## Environment Variables Checklist
- [ ] All required environment variables are set
- [ ] DATABASE_URL is correctly formatted
- [ ] NEXTAUTH_SECRET is at least 32 characters
- [ ] Stripe keys are valid
- [ ] Vercel tokens are configured
